title: Litecoin ($LTC) Network Activity and Price Surge Ahead of Its Halving, Following Historical Pattern
description: Activity on the Litecoin ($LTC) netowrk has surged as August approached, as the cryptocurrency that’s often referred to as the silver to Bitcoin’s gold is set to undergo its third halving event then. The event will reduce the per-block reward from the current 12.5 Litecoin (LTC) to just 6.25 LTC, a move that history suggests […]
